thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Breaking Silence on Market Moves, Trump Laments Selling on ‘Good News’

author: WSJ Roundup
title: Breaking Silence on Market Moves, Trump Laments Selling on ‘Good News’
text:
President Donald Trump broke his silence Wednesday on the stock market’s recent volatility, arguing that good news on Main Street shouldn’t be a cause for concern on Wall Street.
“In the ‘old days,’ ” when good news was reported, the Stock Market would go up. Today, when good news is reported, the Stock Market goes down,” Mr. Trump tweeted. “Big mistake, and we have so much good (great) news about the economy!”
The...
